title: WATCH LIVE | Amy’Leigh kidnapping: Judgment to be delivered in bail application
text:
WATCH LIVE | Amy’Leigh kidnapping: Judgment to be delivered in bail application

11 October, 09:45 AM

Tharina Human, Pieter van Zyl and Laetitia Nel, three of the four people accused of kidnapping 6-year-old Amy'Leigh de Jager, are expected to appear in the Vanderbijlpark Magistrate's Court on Friday.

Magistrate Hussain Khota is expected to deliver judgment in their bail application.

Amy'Leigh was snatched outside her school in Vanderbijlpark on September 2, 2019. Human, a suspended Laerskool Kollegepark Grade RR teacher, was a close friend of the De Jager family.

The State opposed bail, arguing that their release would endanger society, Amy'Leigh and themselves.
description: Tharina Human, Pieter van Zyl and Laetitia Nel, three of the four people accused of kidnapping 6-year-old Amy'Leigh de Jager, are expected to appear in the Vanderbijlpark Magistrate's Court for judgment in the bail application. Watch live.
